Sydney Tomsick is a third-year Statistics and Data Science major at UCLA with a minor in Digital Humanities. She is passionate about deriving valuable insights through data and presenting her findings in creative and innovative ways. She also enjoys web design and user experience research. Outside of academic pursuits, Sydney loves to dance and is one of the directors of Synthesis Dance Theater, a dance club at UCLA.

### Experience 

Sydney is a data journalist for [The Stack](https://stack.dailybruin.com/), a branch of the Daily Bruin. She writes articles about various topics on campus centered around data insights and visualizations. Here is an [article](https://stack.dailybruin.com/2024/01/20/startups-ucla/) she wrote about startups at UCLA.
